title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 437.1 - Legal Authority
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 437.1 - Legal Authority

State Regulations

This subpart is established pursuant to Chapter 810 of
the Laws of 2021, as amended by Chapter 38 of the Laws of 2022, which provides
that the Office of Children and Family Services shall promulgate regulations
regarding the differential response for children under 12 years of age who do
not fall under the definition of juvenile delinquent under section
301.2
of the Family Court Act, but
whose behavior would otherwise bring them under the jurisdiction of Article 3
of the Family Court Act. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18
ยง
437.1

Adopted

New

York State Register December 7, 2022/Volume XLIV, Issue 49, eff. 12/7/2022

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
